title.narrative: Civil Society Unleashed: A Model for Youth & Community Driven Change

description.narrative: Our Model is a youth- leadership approach that unleashes the agency of youth to influence and drive change more effectively. The model of change will support young people to: i) monitor delivery of existing commitments in living initiatives using cutting edge, tech enabled community feedback mechanism; and ii) through research, 2 way feedback loops, and through their knowledge and understanding as community members themselves-identify unmet needs and solutions to challenges in the field of living.
